ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Highpass Keep
ygData.msgSnippet: I should have known by the no-introduction X has invited you into a group click FOLLOW.. thing, but when I saw it was a bard in Lambent I thought...okay, why
ygData.messageBody:
I should have known by the no-introduction "X has invited you into a group
click FOLLOW.." thing, but when I saw it was a bard in Lambent I
thought...okay, why not,two bards can be fun, I can always leave. Turns out
he was the leader of the Raider group...perfect. Well the second heads up
was that he was using a PGT and barbed whip at 30, but hey, sometimes people
just like a certain combo. It was when he said "I will sing Hymn and Jig" I
thought "uh oh." But I really wanted a group...I died shortly thereafter,
however the rest of the evening went smoothly. BTW, his name makes it on the
silly name list but I think I better not mention it :o)
Anyway, Highpass strikes me as clockwork exp, spawn is 14 minutes (from
first gobby to first gobby, 3 total) and when you get a group that can
handle it you just kill/wait/kill/wait. I suppost that is what it is like in
campsites all over Norrath, I have just never played the game that way, I
think I can stand it for a few nights though, then I will have to go find
something dangerous again...(my guild calls me DangerBard or
DangerEnchanter, depending on who I am playing, I just like hunting
someplace I am KOS or that has some other challenge than waiting between
spawns).
So, that is the Highpass report for today. We shall see what tomorrow
brings.

Tszaaz E'Taurguin, 27, Povar
